description: Try our easy to follow Mild Thai Fish Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mild Thai Fish Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the eggplants and cook for another 5 minutes, then gently fold in the snow peas and fish and cook for 2 minutes. Add the tomatoes and half the Thai basil leaves. Cook for a final 2 minutes, then top with the crisp shallots and the remaining basil leaves.
